caption: Fra Angelico’s Annunciation (mid-1430s)
description: Fra Angelico’s depiction of the Archangel Gabriel announcing to Mary that she will conceive Jesus.
subject: The Annunciation of the Virgin Mary
title: The Annunciation

caption: Rembrandt's The Visitation
description: Rembrandt’s portrayal of Mary visiting her cousin Elizabeth, both expecting miraculous children.
subject: Mary visiting Elizabeth
title: The Visitation

caption: Giovanni Antonio Pellegrini's The Nativity
description: Pellegrini’s depiction of the birth of Jesus in a humble stable.
subject: The birth of Jesus Christ
title: The Nativity

caption: Fresco of Presentation in the Temple in Chiesa di Santa Rita by Giulio Campi (1547)
description: Campi’s fresco depicts Mary and Joseph presenting baby Jesus in the Temple.
location: Chiesa di Santa Rita, Cremona, Italy
subject: Presentation of Jesus in the Temple
title: Presentation in the Temple

caption: Finding of Jesus in the Temple mosaic from Lourdes Basilica, France
description: Mosaic depicting the young Jesus found teaching in the Temple after being lost.
subject: Jesus found teaching in the Temple
title: Finding of Jesus in the Temple

caption: An unknown artist’s fresco, Baptism of Christ, in Padua’s church of San Benedetto
description: Fresco depicting John the Baptist baptizing Jesus in the Jordan River.
location: Church of San Benedetto, Padua, Italy
mystery_name: The Baptism of Jesus in the Jordan
subject: John the Baptist baptizing Jesus
title: Baptism of Christ

caption: Carl Bloch’s The Wedding at Cana
description: Bloch’s painting shows Jesus performing His first miracle at a wedding in Cana.
subject: Jesus turning water into wine
title: The Wedding at Cana

caption: James Tissot’s Healing of the Lepers at Capernaum
description: Tissot’s work depicts Jesus healing lepers, demonstrating His divine power.
mystery_name: The Proclamation of the Kingdom of God
subject: Jesus healing lepers
title: Healing of the Lepers at Capernaum

caption: Transfiguration in Vienna’s Votive Church
description: Depiction of Jesus transfigured in glory before Peter, James, and John.
subject: Jesus transfigured before His disciples
title: The Transfiguration

caption: Giacomo Raffaelli (1753-1836) , an Italian mosaicist, created a life-sized mosaic copy of Leonardo da Vinci's The Last Supper
description: Raffaelli’s mosaic recreates Leonardo da Vinci’s Last Supper, depicting Jesus instituting the Eucharist.
subject: Jesus’ last meal with His disciples
title: The Last Supper

caption: Agony in the Garden by Vicente Masip, also known as Vicente Juan Masip
description: A poignant depiction of Jesus praying in Gethsemane, showing His agony before the Passion.
subject: Christ praying in Gethsemane before His crucifixion.
title: Agony in the Garden

caption: Giovanni Antonio Bazzi known as Sodoma, Christ at the Column (c. 1510-1515; detached fresco, 140 x 101 cm; Siena, Pinacoteca Nazionale)
description: A dramatic fresco portraying Christ bound to the column during His scourging.
subject: Jesus being scourged at the pillar.
title: Christ at the Column

caption: Titian’s Christ Crowned with Thorns (c. 1542–1543)
description: A powerful representation of Christ enduring the crowning with thorns.
subject: Jesus being mocked and crowned with thorns.
title: Christ Crowned with Thorns

caption: Pieter Bruegel the Elder’s The Procession to Calvary (1564)
description: A panoramic depiction of Christ carrying the cross amid a chaotic crowd.
subject: Christ carrying the cross towards Golgotha amidst a crowded scene.
title: The Procession to Calvary

caption: The fresco of Crucifixion in the church San Girolamo dei Croati by Pietro Gagliardi (1847-1852)
description: A fresco depicting the crucifixion of Jesus, emphasizing His sacrifice.
subject: The crucifixion of Jesus Christ.
title: Crucifixion

caption: Resurrection (1593) by Annibale Carracci
description: A triumphant depiction of Christ emerging from His tomb in glory.
subject: Jesus rising triumphantly from the tomb.
title: Resurrection

caption: Crossing (Ascension) cupola 1175-1200 Mosaic Basilica di San Marco (Cupola of St. Mark), Venice
description: A Byzantine mosaic illustrating Christ's ascension into heaven.
subject: Christ ascending into heaven.
title: Ascension Mosaic

caption: “Pentecost” by Jean Restout II (1692–1768)
description: A Baroque painting showing the Holy Spirit descending upon the apostles.
mystery_name: The Descent of the Holy Spirit
subject: The descent of the Holy Spirit upon the apostles.
title: Pentecost

caption: The Assumption of Virgin Mary in the main cupola in Chiesa di Santa Maria del Orto by Giuseppe and Andrea Orazi 1706
description: A grand fresco portraying Mary's assumption into heaven.
location: Chiesa di Santa Maria del Orto, Rome
subject: The Virgin Mary being assumed into heaven.
title: The Assumption of Virgin Mary

caption: Coronation of the Virgin, a painting on oil on canvas by Diego Velázquez of the Holy Trinity crowning the Blessed Virgin Mary, at the Museo del Prado
description: A majestic painting of Mary's coronation by the Holy Trinity.
subject: The Virgin Mary being crowned as Queen of Heaven.
title: Coronation of the Virgin

caption: The Annunciation, an 1898 painting by African-American painter Henry Ossawa Tanner
description: A spiritual depiction of the Angel Gabriel announcing to Mary that she will bear the Son of God.
location: Philadelphia Museum of Art, Philadelphia, USA
subject: Annunciation of the Virgin Mary
title: The Annunciation

caption: The painting of Visitation in the church Chiesa dei Santi Severino e Sossio by Federico Maldarelli (1889)
description: Mary visits her cousin Elizabeth, both expecting miraculous births.
location: Chiesa dei Santi Severino e Sossio, Naples, Italy
subject: Visitation of Mary to Elizabeth
title: The Visitation

caption: Gerard van Honthorst - Adoration of the Shepherds (1622)
description: Shepherds gather to worship the newborn Jesus in a humble stable.
subject: Shepherds adoring the newborn Christ
title: Adoration of the Shepherds

caption: The painting of Presentation of Jesus in the Temple in church kostel Svatého Havla by unknown baroque artist
description: Mary and Joseph present the infant Jesus to the Temple priests.
location: Kostel Svatého Havla, Prague, Czech Republic
subject: Presentation of Jesus in the Temple
title: Presentation of Jesus in the Temple

caption: Jesus, at 12, teaching in the Temple
description: At 12, Jesus engages the Temple scholars with his wisdom.
subject: Young Jesus teaching in the Temple
title: Jesus Teaching in the Temple

artist: Leonardo da Vinci (studio of Andrea del Verrocchio)
caption: The Baptism of Christ by Leonardo Da Vinci created in the studio of Andrea del Verrochio around 1475
description: John baptizes Jesus as the heavens open and the Spirit descends.
mystery_name: The Baptism of Jesus in the Jordan
subject: Baptism of Jesus by John the Baptist
title: The Baptism of Christ

caption: Gerard David's The Marriage at Cana
description: Jesus performs his first miracle by turning water into wine.
subject: Wedding feast at Cana where Jesus turns water to wine.
title: The Marriage at Cana

caption: The Adulterous Woman by Lorenzo Lotto
description: Jesus teaches mercy by sparing the woman condemned under law.
subject: Jesus pardons a woman accused of adultery.
title: The Adulterous Woman

caption: Raphael's The Transfiguration
description: Jesus radiates divine light before his disciples atop a mountain.
subject: Transfiguration of Jesus witnessed by Peter, James, and John.
title: The Transfiguration

caption: The Last Supper by Juan de Juanes
description: Jesus institutes the Eucharist during the Passover meal.
subject: Jesus shares his final meal with his disciples.
title: The Last Supper

caption: The Prayer of Jesus in Gethsemane by Alessandro Maganza
description: A depiction of Jesus praying in the Garden of Gethsemane, showing his agony and submission to God's will.
subject: Christ praying in Gethsemane
title: The Prayer of Jesus in Gethsemane

caption: The Flagellation of Christ: Painting by Caravaggio
description: A powerful portrayal of Christ's suffering as he is scourged at the pillar.
subject: Christ being scourged
title: The Flagellation of Christ

caption: Caravaggio's Ecce Homo - Behold The Man
description: Christ crowned with thorns and presented to the crowd by Pontius Pilate.
subject: Christ presented by Pontius Pilate
title: Ecce Homo

caption: The Lost Caravaggio - Ecce Homo
description: A lost painting of Christ crowned with thorns and presented to the crowd.
subject: Christ presented by Pontius Pilate
title: Ecce Homo

caption: Christ carrying the Cross (1605) by Orazio Gentileschi
description: Christ depicted carrying the cross on his way to Golgotha.
subject: Christ carrying the cross
title: Christ Carrying the Cross

caption: James Tissot's What Our Lord Saw From The Cross
description: A depiction of the view Christ had from the cross, including the crowd and his mother.
original_title: Ce que voyait Notre-Seigneur sur la Croix
subject: Christ's view from the cross
title: What Our Lord Saw from the Cross

caption: Caravaggio's The Incredulity of St. Thomas
description: St. Thomas touching Christ's wounds after his resurrection.
subject: St. Thomas touching Christ's wounds
title: The Incredulity of Saint Thomas

caption: Ascension of the Lord by Bernardino Gandino
description: Christ ascending into heaven, witnessed by his disciples.
subject: Christ's ascension into heaven
title: Ascension of the Lord

caption: Pentecost by Titian
description: The Holy Spirit descending upon the apostles and Mary.
mystery_name: The Descent of the Holy Spirit
subject: The descent of the Holy Spirit
title: Pentecost

caption: Fresco of Assumption of Our Lady in the Vision of St Bonaventure in the church Chiesa di Santa Lucia del Gonfalone by Cesare Mariani (1863)
description: Mary being assumed into heaven, witnessed by St. Bonaventure.
location: Chiesa di Santa Lucia del Gonfalone, Rome
original_title: Assunzione della Madonna nella visione di San Bonaventura
subject: Assumption of Mary
title: Assumption of Our Lady in the Vision of St Bonaventure

caption: Coronation of the Virgin, fresco by Giuseppe Mattia Borgnis
description: A fresco depicting the Virgin Mary's coronation as Queen of Heaven by Jesus Christ.
subject: Virgin Mary being crowned by Jesus
title: Coronation of the Virgin

caption: Jan van Eyck's The Annunciation portrays the angel Gabriel announcing to Mary, who humbly accepts God's will
description: Depicts the angel Gabriel announcing to Mary that she will conceive Jesus.
location: National Gallery of Art, Washington, D.C.
subject: Angel Gabriel announcing to Mary
title: The Annunciation

caption: Basilica of the Visitation in Ein Karem, a village in the hill country of Judea where John the Baptist was born
description: Depicts Mary visiting her cousin Elizabeth, who is pregnant with John the Baptist.
location: Basilica of the Visitation, Ein Karem
subject: Mary visiting Elizabeth
title: The Visitation

caption: Nativity with St. Francis and St. Lawrence by Caravaggio
description: Shows the nativity of Jesus with St. Francis and St. Lawrence present.
location: Stolen, formerly in Oratory of Saint Lawrence, Palermo
original_title: Natività con i Santi Francesco e Lorenzo
subject: Birth of Jesus with saints
title: Nativity with St. Francis and St. Lawrence

caption: Simeon's Song of Praise by Arent de Gelder
description: Depicts Simeon praising God upon seeing the infant Jesus in the temple.
subject: Presentation of Jesus at the Temple
title: Simeon's Song of Praise

caption: Finding of the Savior in the Temple by William Holman Hunt
description: Depicts Jesus as a youth discussing scripture with temple teachers.
subject: Jesus found teaching in the temple
title: The Finding of the Savior in the Temple

caption: Apparition of the Messiah, an oil painting on canvas, measuring 540 cm × 750 cm, by Russian painter Alexander Andreyevich Ivanov (1806–1858)
description: Depicts John the Baptist gesturing toward Jesus as he appears to the people.
mystery_name: The Proclamation of the Kingdom of God
subject: Jesus appearing to the people
title: Apparition of the Messiah

caption: Wedding at Cana by Paolo Veronese
description: Depicts Jesus turning water into wine at a wedding feast.
subject: Jesus performing his first miracle
title: The Wedding at Cana

caption: Christ in the Storm on the Sea of Galilee, a 1633 oil-on-canvas painting by the Dutch Golden Age painter Rembrandt van Rijn
description: Depicts Jesus calming a storm while sailing with his disciples.
location: Stolen, formerly at Isabella Stewart Gardner Museum
mystery_name: The Proclamation of the Kingdom of God
original_title: Christus in de storm op het meer van Galilea
subject: Jesus calming the storm
title: Christ in the Storm on the Sea of Galilee

caption: The Savior’s Transfiguration by Theophanes the Greek
description: Depicts Jesus radiating divine light atop Mount Tabor.
subject: Jesus transfigured before his disciples
title: The Transfiguration

caption: Christ and the Disciples Before the Last Supper by Henry Ossawa Tanner
description: A solemn depiction of Christ and His disciples in prayer before the Last Supper, highlighting Tanner's mastery of light and spirituality.
location: Philadelphia Museum of Art, Philadelphia, USA
subject: Christ and disciples preparing for the Last Supper
title: Christ and the Disciples Before the Last Supper

caption: The Arrest of Christ Kiss of Judas by Giotto
description: Giotto's fresco captures the dramatic moment of Judas betraying Christ with a kiss, emphasizing emotional intensity and human realism.
subject: Judas betraying Christ with a kiss
title: The Arrest of Christ (Kiss of Judas)

caption: The Flagellation of Our Lord Jesus Christ by Bouguereau
description: Bouguereau's painting portrays Christ's suffering during the flagellation, showcasing his technical precision and emotional depth.
subject: Christ being scourged at the pillar
title: The Flagellation of Our Lord Jesus Christ

caption: Van Dyck's _The Crowning with Thorns_ (early 17th century), a Baroque depiction of Christ's suffering and paradoxical triumph
description: Van Dyck's Baroque work captures Christ's anguish and dignity during the crowning with thorns, emphasizing divine triumph through suffering.
subject: Christ being crowned with thorns
title: The Crowning with Thorns

caption: Raphael's Christ Falls on the Way to Calvary, a painting depicting Christ stumbling under the cross with Mary and a crowd witnessing
description: Raphael's depiction of Christ's fall under the cross combines dramatic movement with serene beauty, reflecting High Renaissance ideals.
original_title: Christo che cade sotto la croce
subject: Christ stumbling under the cross
title: Christ Falls on the Way to Calvary

caption: The Descent from the Cross (1616-1617) by Rubens: A dynamic, dramatic depiction of Christ's descent
description: Rubens' Baroque masterpiece vividly portrays the descent of Christ's body from the cross, filled with emotion and movement.
location: Cathedral of Our Lady, Antwerp, Belgium
subject: Christ being taken down from the cross
title: The Descent from the Cross

caption: The Three Marys at the Tomb by Annibale Carracci, 17th century at Hermitage Museum, reveals Baroque vividness and drama
description: Carracci's Baroque work depicts the moment the three Marys find Christ's tomb empty, emphasizing divine light and resurrection hope.
subject: The three Marys discovering the empty tomb of Christ
title: The Three Marys at the Tomb

caption: Christ Taking Leave of the Apostles by Duccio, 14th century, Museo dell'Opera, tempera on wood, Gothic details
description: Duccio's Gothic panel shows Christ's ascension, combining gold leaf detailing with spiritual solemnity and Byzantine influences.
location: Museo dell'Opera del Duomo, Siena, Italy
subject: Christ bidding farewell to His apostles
title: Christ Taking Leave of the Apostles

caption: Simone Peterzano's Pentecost depicts the Virgin and disciples receiving the Holy Spirit in Mannerist style
description: Peterzano's Mannerist work captures the fiery descent of the Holy Spirit, blending dramatic gestures with divine illumination.
location: Church of San Fedele, Milan, Italy
mystery_name: The Descent of the Holy Spirit
subject: The descent of the Holy Spirit upon Mary and the apostles
title: Pentecost

caption: The Divine Exchange Between Mother and Son
description: This Gothic stained-glass window illustrates Mary's assumption into heaven, radiant with light and celestial glory.
subject: The Virgin Mary's assumption into heaven
title: The Assumption of Mary

caption: Mary, Help of Christians by Giuseppe Rollini
description: A fresco depicting the Virgin Mary as the Helper of Christians, showcasing her maternal care and intercessory role in the faith.
subject: Virgin Mary
title: Mary, Help of Christians
